CAIM_001.description: Mandatory cryptographic signature file (.sig) not found for the specified asset.

CAIM_002.description: Structural Descriptor Validation Map (SDVM) type definition does not match actual resource structure.

CAIM_003.description: Calculated hash of the asset does not match the signed manifest checksum.

CAIM_004.description: Asset retrieval or loading exceeded the predefined timeout threshold during RRP handshake.
